features: GORE-TEX® INFINIUM™ Laminate, 40D Polyamide Plain Weave Face Textile, CORDURA® Fibres For Superior Durability
Three Slider Leg Ventilation, Compatible with ski boots up 16cm (Approx. 6.25") ankle diameter, Integrated Snow Gaiter, YAK Design Abrasion Panel
BLACKYAK Side Hook, Loops for optional belt
Two Hand Pockets, One Tigh Pocket
BLACKYAK KEVLAR® ankle Reinforcement, Climashield®, YAK FLOW™
Wash gently by hand in Cold water, Do not Bleach, Do not Tumble Dry, Remove Promptly, Do not Iron, Do not use Fabric Softener, Do not Dryclean
